price: Él merece ser alabado en los cielos y en la Tierra, [alábenlo] por la tarde y al mediodía.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَعَشِيّٗا وَحِينَ تُظۡهِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walahu al-ḥamdu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi waʿashiyyan waḥīna tuẓ'hirūna
